profile:
Full service general contractor with specialized crews offering the following services: Wheelchair accessibility conversion and designs for homes and businesses, GAF Master Elite Roofing, Certified VELUX Skylight and Sun Tunnel installation specialist, windows, doors, siding, environmentally friendly attic insulation, soffit/fascia/trough, custom bathroom renovations, commercial drywall and project management. Voted #1 contracting company in Durham Region 2009, 2010 and 2011 by Durham Business Times. Received the 2010 & 2013 Business Excellence Award of the year from the Ajax-Pickering Board of Trade. Received the City of Pickering Access Award for Disability Issues 2014. Habitat for Humanity.
For all your home repair/ renovation needs, please book an appointment with one of our qualified customer representatives. 

Some areas of expertise are: 

- Bathroom Renovation 
- Builders
- Cabinetry & Millwork 
- Chimney Build & Repair 
- Concrete Contractors 
- Condominium Renovations 
- Decks 
- Demolition 
- Design/Project Management 
- Drywall Contractors 
- Elevators, Lifts & Ramps 
- Excavation 
- Fences & Gates 
- Fire & Water Damage Restoration 
- Foundations 
- Framing 
- General Contractors 
- Green Products & Services 
- Gutters & Eavestroughs 
- Home Office Renovation 
- Insulation  
- Kitchen Planning & Renovation
- Masonry & Bricklaying 
- Renovation Advisors 
- Roofing 
- Skylights 
- Tuck Pointing 
- Waterproofing 
- Wheelchair accesibility conversion for homes or businesses.
- Windows & Doors

profile:
!!CONTACT US NOW FOR YOUR FREE ESTIMATE AND ASK US ABOUT OUR EXTERIOR DISCOUNT AND FINANCING PROGRAMS!!

ASPHALT ROOFING
STEEL ROOFING
SIDING
EAVESTROUGHING, FASCIA, SOFFIT
FENCES
DECKS

AJM Renovations is proud to announce we now offer financing with many options available for our customers.

We specialize in Interiors:
 Walls, Drywall, Flooring, Bathrooms, Kitchen, Windows, Doors etc


Our work is guaranteed with industry leading warranties from the company all the way to distributors. 

Projects inside or outside the home might seem like an expensive and complicated job, but no matter what project you have in mind, trust our team to help you bring your vision to life. We will take care of every aspect of the job, and complete it on time and within the agreed budget, while delivering the best quality result and treating EVERY customer as if they were our ONLY customer!

Thank you in advance for allowing us the opportunity to work with you on your home!
